amendment.description: An amendment numbered 73 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to reduce the salary of Polly Trottenberg, Deputy Secretary of Transportation, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Santos amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 112 - 318 (Roll no. 620).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Santos amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 112 - 318 (Roll no. 620).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
